pr_title: Remove ABT Experiment Cleanup from FIAM fetch path

timeline.message: quick cleanup of FIAM API Client

timeline.author: prakhar1989
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -243,7 +243,6 @@ private boolean shouldIgnoreCache(String event) {
                                           "Successfully fetched %d messages from backend",
                                           resp.getMessagesList().size())))
                           .doOnSuccess(analyticsEventsManager::updateContextualTriggers)
-                          .doOnSuccess(abtIntegrationHelper::updateRunningExperiments)

replies.bodyText: this is the whole point of this PR. This updateRunningExperiments removes the active experiments which are not currently running
replies.author: JasonAHeron
